string-array.name: godzilla_vs_kong
string-array.item: The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance.
Writers: Terry Rossio, Michael Dougherty, Zach Shield
Stars: Alexander Skarsg√•rd, Millie Bobby Brown, Rebecca Hall
